EmailTemplate.subject: The Aesthetics of Excellence: LaQuan Smith’s New Bigcommerce Site is Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
If you watched LaQuan’s NYFW show and line launch with us on Periscope on Sunday, you saw history in the making. For the first time ever, a designer launched a collection offline — with it immediately available for purchase on their online store <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/laquan-smith]]>.
Today, you can check out LaQuan’s brand new website, built using Bigcommerce’s new themes. LaQuan was an early-access beta tester to our new themes — which will be available for all merchants in the coming weeks. Stay tuned!
Read more <[[www.bigcommerce.com/blog/LaQuan-smith]]>
Kind regards,
The Bigcommerce Team {{my.LitmusToken}}
